content: - 3 -     Bryant, founder of Operation Hope; the late Jack Kemp, who served as Secretary of   Housing and Urban Development and as congressman of western New York; and   Congresswoman Sheila Jackson Lee of Texas.  It is wonderful to see so many individuals   and organizations working toward the common goal of helping Americans make the best   choices for their financial futures.   Thank you again.
